Source code for PyAnnotation

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from PyFeatureStructure import *


[docs]class PyAnnotation:
    """
    A PyAnnotation is the artifcat being annotated.

    An annotation is a labelled feature structure.
    The annotation class/interface also provides convenience
    methods for setting and getting values from a feature
    structure.

    """


[docs]    def __init__(self, label, features = PyFeatureStructure()):
        """Construct a new PyAnnotation.

        Parameters
        ----------
        label : str
        features : array_like
            List of PyFeature objects.
        set : str
            This PyAnnotation, PyAnnotationSpace.
        element : object
            A PyGraphElement object a.

        """
        
        self._label = label
        self._features = features
        self._set = None
        self._element = None



[docs]    def fromAnnotation(a):
        """Construct a new PyAnnotation.

        Parameters
        ----------
        `a` : int 
            PyAnnotation is object.
            
        """
        return PyAnnotation(a.getLabel(), 
                            PyFeatureStructure.fromFS(a.getFeatures()))


    def __repr__(self):
        return "Annotation label = " + self._label


[docs]    def add(self, name, value):
        """Creates and add a PyFeature to this PyAnnotation.

        Parameters
        ----------
        `name` : str
            Name of the PyFeature to be added.
        value : int
            Value of the PyFeature to be added.

        """

        return self._features.add(name, value)        	



[docs]    def addFeature(self, f):
        """Adds the passed PyFeature to this PyAnnotation
        
        Parameters
        ----------
        f : object
            PyFeature is object.
            
        """
        
        self._features.addFeature(f)



[docs]    def features(self):
        """Returns the features.
        
        Returns
        -------
        features : array_like
            List of the PyFeatures of this PyAnnotation.
        
        """
        
        return self._features.features()



[docs]    def getFeature(self, name):
        """Searches for a PyFeature in this PyAnnotation 
        list by name.
        
        Parameters
        ----------
        `name` : str
        
        Returns
        -------
        feature : feature
            PyFeature.
        
        """
        
        return self._features.get(name)
        


[docs]    def getFeatureValue(self, name):
        """Searches for a PyFeature in this PyAnnotation 
        list by name, returns that PyFeature value.
        
        Parameters
        ----------        
        `name` : str
        
        Returns
        -------
        featureValue : str
            Or None.
        
        """
        
        f = self.getFeature(name)
        if f is not None and f.isAtomic():
            return f.getStringValue()
        return None
